basic_flat_buffer::shrink_to_fit

Reallocate the buffer to fit the readable bytes exactly.

Synopsis 
void
shrink_to_fit();
Description

Buffer sequences previously obtained using basic_flat_buffer::data or basic_flat_buffer::prepare become invalid.

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee.
